column4: I installed an ubuntu lamp server and an openssh server, can anyone point me at some project resource guides/pages/tutorials that could help me figure out how to make it go? this is educational and will never be a "live" server and I'm a complete noob
define "make it go", didn't you installed it already ?
yeah sorry bad choice of words on my part, it is up and running, no errors, just need some noob project guides to get rolling
